Royalty and loyalty or A short survey of the power of kings over their subjects: and the duty of subjects to their kings. Abstracted out of ancient and later writers, for the better composeing of these present distempers: and humbly presented to ye consideration of his Ma.tie. and both Howses of Parliament, for the more speedy effecting of a pacification / by Ro: Grosse dd: 1647 Grosse, Robert, D.D.
[2], 62 p.
s.n., [London : 1647]
T.p. is engraved. Place of publication from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 7th 1647". Imperfect: heavy foxing in places, affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

s.n., [London : 1647]
